bibl.title: P. Oxy. 3574: "Eleutheropolis of the New Arabia".
bibl.note: Against the position that Eleutheropolis of Nea Arabia is to be located in Egypt close to Aegyptus Herculia. The evidence favors the view of J.R. Rea that Eleutheropolis fell in a province called New Arabia, to be identified with one of the two Arabias of the Verona List.
Mayerson Philip, P. Oxy. 3574: "Eleutheropolis of the New Arabia".
